I would search old newspapers for a mention of those swords. Unfortunately,=
 I don't read Japanese or Korean.
Bill

___________________________________=
_______















=A0



  


    
      
      
      It would be alm=
ost difficult to find those cement-buried swords in Seoul these days. Excep=
t for a few historical buildings, very little survives from the Japanese pe=
riod. Those swords would have been found by now and made the newspapers.


=

A few years after the Japanese departed, the North Koreans first, and then=
 the Chinese passed through Seoul before the Korean war ended in a stalemat=
e. Maybe they were found then and sold to foreign soldier.








  





=
